sources.title: Bars And Stripes (1931)
sources.description: Krazy Kat is playing a viola (and doing so badly) as the short opens. He's playing so poorly that all the musical instruments behind him razz him about his playing and his viola finally stops his playing. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/bars-and-stripes-1931/

metadata.Plot: In this episode, the musical instruments rebel when Krazy mistreats them. They launch a full scale military attack. The raise an army. They are the mistreated ones here. Often these episodes are not satisfying because Krazy Kat is often the aggressor and the villain. The animation is wonderful and worth the effort.
